name: Particity
description:
At first, we wanted to make a big game that would have 15-30 levels in a huge map, but in a while we realized that it was not going to happen. In the end, we've decided it would be best to create a sort of "intro" for the game we wanted. That means that the game has 6 levels, in which you should learn some basics (how to use the Particle Gun, walking, jumping...).

Disclaimer:

1. This game is completely free. If you paid for it, 1) Thank you very much for your kindness, 2) it's your fault.
2. The game is not in any way inspired by Portal, nor I have ever heard of anything like that.
3. It has been confirmed that blinking lights can trigger epileptic seizures. If you die because of playing this game, you shouldn't've played it.
